description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A top-down space combat game that is easy to pick up and play, yet rewards mastery of subtle tactics. Detailed 3D graphics and fast-paced combat are combined with a ten mission story-driven campaign. Online co-op and skirmish modes add great replay value.
description.short: A top-down space combat game that is easy to pick up and play, yet rewards mastery of subtle tactics. Detailed 3D graphics and fast-paced combat are combined with a ten mission story-driven campaign. Online co-op and skirmish modes add great replay value.
